attributes.action: NO SECOND REFERENDUM THE BRITISH PEOPLE HAVE SPOKEN AND CHOSE TO LEAVE THE EU
attributes.additional_details: “We have our own dream and our own task. We are with Europe, but not of it. We are linked but not combined. We are interested and associated but not absorbed. If Britain must choose between Europe and the open sea, she must always choose the open sea.”
attributes.background: A counter act to the current petition regarding a request for a 2nd referendum. the British people chose to leave the EU there shouldn't be a 2nd referendum, where will it stop? when the remain finally win. Time to join as a nation and show the world how GREAT, GREAT BRITAIN IS
